title: We Must Go Warily (3C48)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, exert a [Gondor] companion twice to make each minion's twilight cost +1 until the next regroup phase.
Lore:	”'This is the lawn of Parth Galen: a fair place in the summer days of old. Let us hope that no evil has yet come here.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
